longBusinessSummary: Mifflinburg Bancorp, Inc. operates as a bank holding company for Mifflinburg Bank and Trust Company that provides various commercial banking products and services in Pennsylvania. The company offers checking and savings accounts; certificates of deposits; health savings accounts; home, personal, auto, medical/professional, farm/agricultural, and non-profit loans; lines of credit and overdrafts; and credit cards, as well as online and mobile banking services. It also provides merchant cards, lock box processing, remote deposit, CD file storage, safe and night deposit boxes, automatic transfers, notary, e-statements with check images, consolidated statements, stop payment orders, and wire transfer services. In addition, the company offers investment products comprising retirement, college funding, life insurance, brokerage, and investment analysis services; and business services, including IRAs, 401k plans, pensions and profit-sharing plans, SEPs, and defined contribution plans. Mifflinburg Bancorp, Inc. was founded in 1872 and is based in Mifflinburg, Pennsylvania.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Thomas C. Graver Jr., CPA, CPA
